title: Getting my summer 2021 internship + general tips and advice
snippet: During the summer of 2021, I interned at the University of Waterloo developing a website for the Software Architecture Group (SWAG). title: Blog post views on a static blog for free
snippet: BackgroundI wanted to create a blog, and do so for free without being bound by a service that holds my content.
